decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

37TR/560/001 (Ground Floor plan as Existing) Page 1 of 10; 37TR/560/002 (First Floor Plan as Existing) Page 2 of 10; 37TR/560/003 (Second Floor Plan as Existing) Page 3 of 10; 37TR/560/004 (Roof Plan as Existing) Page 4 of 10; 37TR/560/005 (Front Elevation as Existing) Page 5 of 10; 37TR/560/006 (Side (Chatsworth Rise) Facing Elevation as Existing) Page 6 of 10; 37TR/560/007 (Rear Elevation as Existing) Page 7 of 10; 37TR/560/008 (Side (North-facing) Elevation as Existing) Page 8 of 10; 37TR/560/009 (Ground Floor Front Garden Plan as Existing) Page 9 of 10; 37TR/560/010 (Front Elevation from The Ridings as Existing) Page 10 of 10; 37TR/560/012 (Site Location Plan); 37TR/560/111 (Site Block Plan as Proposed); 37TR/560/101 (Ground Floor Plan as Proposed) Page 1 of 12; 37TR/560/101 (Ground Floor Plan as Proposed) 2 of 12; 37TR/560/102 (First Floor Plan as Proposed) 3 of 12; 37TR/560/102 (First Floor Plan as Proposed) 4 of 12; 37TR/560/103 (Second Floor Plan as Proposed) Page 5 of 12; 37TR/560/104 (Roof Plan as Proposed) 6 of 12; 37TR/560/105 (Front Elevation as Proposed) 7 of 12; 37TR/560/106 (Side [Chatsworth Rise] Facing Elevation as Proposed) 8 of 12; 37TR/560/107 (Rear Elevation as Proposed) Page 9 of 12; 37TR/560/108 (Side [North facing] Elevation as Proposed) Page 10 of 12; 37TR/560/109 (Ground Floor Front Garden Plan as Proposed) Page 11 of 12; 37TR/560/110 (Front Elevation From The Ridings as Proposed) Page 12 of 12; Heritage Statement (dated March 2023); Design and Access Statement (dated March 2023)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| Prior to the installation of the replacement windows hereby approved, details of the windows, including cross sections, fixings, materials and dimensions, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The details shall be fully implemented as approved.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings in accordance with policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1 (h), 1.2 (g) and 2.10 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), and policy D4 of the London Plan (2021).
| The proposed window on the northern elevation shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012).
| No part of the flat roofs of the proposed dwellinghouse shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policies D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Conversion of garage into habitable use involving replacing garage door with window and associated external alteration to increase the height of garage; single storey rear extension; first floor rear extension; rear dormer roof extension (following removal of existing rear dormer); single storey side extension (following demolition of existing side extension); replacement of existing double glazed aluminium windows and doors to the front, side and rear elevation with double glazed aluminium windows and doors of the same design and pattern; alterations to front driveway landscape involving Marshals Tell permeable paving; and installation of ramp.
application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
